name: The Arena (Joe E. Measles)
description:
Game I made during classes in 11th grade. Very fun twin stick shooter.

This is The Arena a twin stick shooter based around the limitation of only having one projectile. You throw the weapon and retrieve it to kill a variety of square enemies.

Arrow keys or WASD to move and spacebar or click to throw and retrieve the hook.
All of the graphics, music, and sound within are created by me.
